title: 114_hr5549
content: Medical Marijuana Research Act of 2016 This bill amends the Controlled Substances Act to: modify requirements regarding the production of marijuana through the National Institute on Drug Abuse Drug Supply Program, establish, with respect to marijuana research,nbsp, a new federal registration processnbsp. That is separate from the process for research involving other schedule I drugs. Establish a process for registering persons to manufacture or distribute marijuana for medical research purposes, and modify other requirements related to marijuana research and production.
